title: Developing Quality Learning in Inclusive School Environments: Simulation-Based Education Grounded in Mixed-Methods Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational theory and general understanding of inclusive educational environments
context.additional_context: A practice-centered training program to enhance inclusive learning design competencies for students with disabilities in language education domains

learning_goals: Learners can create three or more language lesson design documents applying UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles in inclusive educational environments
Learners can execute learning support strategies by disability type through VR simulations with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can write analysis reports on inclusive education effectiveness using mixed-methods research design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
